TextView.android:text: You can create friends-only games if you want to play with just people you know. Add friends by long tapping on a game and selecting from the list, or by searching from the friends list.
If you only want to play games against people you know, select 'friends only' when creating a game. Only players you have friended will be able to join these games.
Invite your friends to play a game - long press on a game that has yet to start and choose the 'Invite' option.

To block offensive users from sending you future chat messages, long press on a chat message and choose 'Block User'. Blocked users will be unable to send you future chat messages, and unable to join games that you have started.
